required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Postoperative Recurrence Risk Evaluation of Hormone Receptor Positive, Her-2 Negative Breast Cancer by Using Different 21-gene Detection Kits (REBCK)

brief_summary.textblock: Breast cancer patients with early breast cancer were enrolled according to the inclusion criteria. Baseline characteristics were recorded from medical record system. Recurrence score were obtained by 21-gene detection kits from different biological companies. Relationship between recurrence score and the prognosis was explored. Meanwhile, the investigators analyzed the consistency of the results obtained from various 21-gene test kits and immunohistochemistry detection.

primary_outcome.description: x2 value and P value of chi-square test

secondary_outcome.description: kappa value, P value of consistency analysis

intervention.description: Recurrence score were obtained by 21-gene detection kits from different biological companies. The expression of ER, PR, and Her-2 were also detected by IHC.

study_pop.textblock: Breast cancer patients with early breast cancer were enrolled according to the inclusion criteria. Baseline characteristics were recorded from medical record system. Recurrence score were obtained by 21-gene detection kits from different biological companies. Relationship between recurrence score and the prognosis was explored. Meanwhile, we analyzed the consistency of the results obtained from various 21-gene test kits and immunohistochemistry detection.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. breast cancer in stage I-III, tumor size〉0.5cm
2. lymph nodes negative
3. hormone receptor positive （ER+/PR+,ER+/PR-,ER-/PR+）
4. HER2 negative（IHC 0 or +， FISH negative）
5. receive endocrine therapy only
6. enough FFPE samples within 10 years（3~6 10μm ）
7. patients with integrated medical records
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Tumor cells <5%
2. Isolated RNA<500ng

responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor, Thyroid breast and vascular surgery, Principal Investigator
